attributes.additional_details:
Thankyou for taking the time to sign this petition, as parents we feel so passionate about this decision and totally object.
Our children go through so many daily challenges in their lives and once again their faced with a life changing hurdle. 
The amazing staff at Caradogs lsc are also at risk of losing their jobs and they really don't deserve to they are amazing with our children please help us by signing  and sharing thank you so much  from the busy bee and flamingos parents
attributes.background: Caradog primary in aberdare is a much loved much needed school. Our children from the lsc busy bees and flamingos are being forced to leave and attend yet another new school for some children this will be their 4th or 5th school! Caradog has everything our children need from nursery to year 6

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Education in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Assembly. You could start a petition to the Welsh Assembly here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
